get.summary: ListClusters returns sync state information for all connected clusters.

connectedAt.description: connected_at is when this cluster initially connected to the manager (RFC3339 format).

lastUpdate.description: last_update is when the last sync occurred (RFC3339 format).

serviceCount.description: service_count is the number of services currently synced from this cluster.

syncStatus.description: sync_status indicates the health of the sync based on last_update timing.

metricsEnabled.description: metrics_enabled indicates whether this cluster's edge supports metrics collection.

v1alpha1ClusterSyncInfo.description: ClusterSyncInfo contains synchronization status and metadata for a connected cluster.

clusters.description: clusters contains information about each connected cluster's sync status.

v1alpha1ListClustersResponse.description: ListClustersResponse contains the list of all connected clusters and their sync status.

v1alpha1SyncStatus.description:
SyncStatus represents the health of cluster synchronization.

 - SYNC_STATUS_INITIALIZING: Connected but hasn't received full state yet
 - SYNC_STATUS_HEALTHY: Recent updates within expected timeframe
 - SYNC_STATUS_STALE: No recent updates, potentially problematic
 - SYNC_STATUS_DISCONNECTED: Connection lost
